column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Went for the regular menu. Staff was great. Area was clean. I had an amazing appetizer with the Pork Belly AND I can't stop thinking about the mushroom risotto and cornstarch catfish. This restaurant is amazing and it might be one of my favorite Houston restaurants to date. It's located in River Oaks with such a great atmosphere. Thank you Bosscat!
